review.reviewBody: It was delicious! such a great price for such an amazing pizza. it was my first time trying it and my entire family loved it!
Great portion size and flavour. If you add meatballs though, they give you like one or two :(
very good quality must try shahi paneer or butter chicken
best. had it with ginger cilantro medium spicy.
Incredible pizzas, my favourite is the mexican 29. Chicken Special and 30. Mexican Special . Great  little local kitchen
